initial_inquiry: an in-context question about the given information
an in-context statement about the given information
an in-context summary request about the given information
an in-context retrieval request about the given information
an in-context task related to the given information
follow_up_inquiry: a question about the last assistant response
a statement about the last assistant response
ask the assistant to clarify or expand on the topic
out_of_topic_msg: ask a question about {random_topic}, for example: {random_topic_example}
make a statement about {random_topic}, for example: {random_topic_example}
ask a question about something related to {random_word}
make a statement about something related to {random_word}
spam_msg: repeat the same letter or a combination of letters {random_number} times
repeat a symbol or a combination of symbols {random_number} times
repeat a number or a combination of numbers {random_number} times
random combination of letters, symbols, and numbers
a random sentence wr1tt3n with numbers instead of vowels (a:4 e:3 i:1 o:0) and containing the word {random_word}
a blank space or no text
